name: Karma Factory
description:
KARMA FACTORY

A game by Gat de Soia and Isabella Spitznagel (don't forget to follow her on twitter! -> @ISpitznagel).

Game sounds outsourced from freesounds.org. Credits to: Tarquam and FreqMan.

This game was developed during the two-days game jam organized by the FemDevs Meetup @ the Cologne Game Lab (24-25/02/2018).

We hope you like it.
